nrqlQueries.query: SELECT latest(dagshub.loss) FROM Metric TIMESERIES SINCE 1800 seconds ago FACET Owner, Repository,metricName

rawConfiguration.text:
Monitor training metrics in real time
---
# Watch a metric
## Define the metric to watch
By default, the dashboard displays the "Loss" metric in the chart widget just left of this one. To change the displayed metric, click on the top right corner of the chart widget, and hit "edit".
In the query, change `dagshub.loss` to any metric you are logging prepended with `dagshub.` (i.e `dagshub.val_loss`). 
## Run an experiment
In order to see metrics, an experiment must be running at this time. If the experiment has finished running, try changing the displayed time range.
## For more details on the integration, read the [integration docs](https://docs.newrelic.com/docs/integrations/mlops-integrations/dagshub-mlops-integration/).
